channel.title: RSPS Website Layout
channel.description:
[IMG]http://wowcow.3owl.com/www/index.php/view/51341d3e0b3ad[/img]
Just some Constructive criticism, and thoughts :)

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

If im honest, this to me looks more like a poster. the navigation needs sorting, the “Home” “Play Now” & “Forums” Dont look like texts either. But the picture in the center, looks like a slide show and it looks pretty cool. the “further server information here” should not be really there. I would use the gray rectangle to seperate it with the footer and the click here for blah… should be a link which is small.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:21, topic:504559”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=622787.msg4259344#msg4259344 date=1363300503]

Oh, my bad. Well in that case everything else besides the code part applies :>
[/quote]Uhm Twitter and then Tumblr, and I don’t understand what you mean by default font, this was made in photoshop, if you were relating to css, I didn’t use that.

Wait… People link others to tumblr like that? Lol.[/quote]I don’t know I guess so.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:19, topic:504559”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=622787.msg4259339#msg4259339 date=1363299799]
Oh, my bad. Well in that case everything else besides the code part applies :>
[/quote]Uhm Twitter and then Tumblr, and I don’t understand what you mean by default font, this was made in photoshop, if you were relating to css, I didn’t use that.[/quote]
Oh shit that is Tumblr lol, I just seen the T and didn’t let it register :rolleyes:. Sorry, the font you’ve used looks like the default font that is used if you don’t specify otherwise through css, I’d suggest changing it to fit the theme of the site a bit more

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Ruby:

Did you write any code for this or merely make an image? If you wrote the code behind it please include that so we can properly critique something :P. You have the twitter icon twice, you haven’t changed the default font, it may not be multi resolutional, the links aren’t easily distinguishable in my opinion. There’s a large room for improvement, good job for a beginner though, keep it up

I think there was a reason he put it in the graphics section, not the web dev

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Every bit of any advice stated above has been taken into consideration.

[quote=“Fridder, post:12, topic:504559”]Looks way too big. Make the pictures a lot smaller. Don’t make the text so obnoxiously large.

Nonetheless it’s a nice layout.[/quote]If I do make the pictures smaller, what content would take the place?

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:504559”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=622787.msg4252034#msg4252034 date=1362380121]

apparently the new white 2h actually
[/quote]yeah, something white haha.

Racist :o[/quote]Niggah I aint racist, I’m as black as a cloud.

[quote=“Flame_, post:10, topic:504559”]Overall looks quite nice.
You need to take into account that some people have laptops and/or smaller screens, so I think it should be sized down a bit.
I do like it, though.
Maybe you could incorporate a sort of gray gradient into the middle section to give it a little “Umph.”[/quote]Yeah it is big, but it’s really just a design and concept, its a .psd file and a .jpg, When converted into a website (if converted), size ratio will be taken into consideration.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Looks way too big. Make the pictures a lot smaller. Don’t make the text so obnoxiously large.

Nonetheless it’s a nice layout.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Website Layout
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Overall looks quite nice.
You need to take into account that some people have laptops and/or smaller screens, so I think it should be sized down a bit.
I do like it, though.
Maybe you could incorporate a sort of gray gradient into the middle section to give it a little “Umph.”

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:504559”]Personally, I think it’d be cool if the sword at the top was smaller and was a bit like this:
Sword> Link | Link | Link <Sword[/quote]Thought considered, I can do that.

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:504559”]The sword looks nice m8[/quote]It’s not mine, I think its RuneScapes new White sword.

[quote=“Soulcist, post:4, topic:504559”]Yeah, I suppose this looks nice but I can’t imagine being wow’d by this.[/quote]What features in a website wow you?

I’d love to be able to now these features.
